price: 183. Mpe bobuba bato te na bimekelo na bango, mpe bosala mabe kati na mokili te, (mpe bosomba bosembo ya bato na misolo te).
arabic: وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
